    • Method Detail

      • assignPlayerPieces

        public void assignPlayerPieces(char side)
        Assigns respective pieces to players according to which side they are on. Order of adding pieces to this list follows the adding order protocol as defined in Player.pieceList
        Parameters:
        side - side owning the pieces
        See Also:
        pieceList

      • piecesCaptured

        public void piecesCaptured(boolean captured)
        Sets all pieces in the player's piecelist to captured or not captured.
        Parameters:
